Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave? Your jawline is perfect.

Entries.DialogueText: Your feminine allure is irresistible today. I can't keep my eyes off you. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your feminine allure is irresistible today. I can't keep my eyes off you.

Entries.DialogueText: I feel burnt out in your absence. But when I hear that sound of muddy boots on wood, my heart rises from the ash.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel burnt out in your absence. But when I hear that sound of muddy boots on wood, my heart rises from the ash.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm doing a walking meditation. It's good for creativity.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm doing a walking meditation. It's good for creativity.

Entries.DialogueText: Be careful out there! I do worry about you sometimes. There are people in the world who would take advantage of you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Be careful out there! I do worry about you somes. There are people in the world who would take advantage of you.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a simple life, but I like it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a simple life, but I like it.

Entries.DialogueText: I've been taking much better care of myself now that we're together. The bachelor life wasn't particularly healthy for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been taking much better care of myself now that we're together. The bachelor life wasn't particularly healthy for me.

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning, {Farmer_Name}! I made us a pot of coffee.[395]
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning, ! I made us a pot of coffee.

Entries.DialogueText: I find myself craving this robust flavor nearly every morning.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I find myself craving this robust flavor nearly every morning.

Entries.DialogueText: If you find a spider in the house, don't squash it! Just let me know and I'll take the poor thing outside.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you find a spider in the house, don't squash it! Just let me know and I'll take the poor thing outside.

Entries.DialogueText: Today is going to be a fantastic day... I can feel it! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Today is going to be a fantastic day... I can feel it!

Entries.DialogueText: I get this special feeling in my nose...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I get this special feeling in my nose...

Entries.DialogueText: I've had this recurring nightmare that you gave me a buzz cut... You wouldn't ever do that to me, would you? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've had this recurring nightmare that you gave me a buzz cut... You wouldn't ever do that to me, would you?

Entries.DialogueText: I trust you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I trust you.

Entries.DialogueText: I've been keeping a journal ever since we moved in together. Now that I actually have a life, I have lots to write about. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been keeping a journal ever since we moved in together. Now that I actually have a life, I have lots to write about.

Entries.DialogueText: I want to make sure I always remember these years.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I want to make sure I always remember these years.

Entries.DialogueText: From the brightest winter star, to the shimmer of an iridium vein... nothing can compare to my wonderful man. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: From the brightest winter star, to the shimmer of an iridium vein... nothing can compare to my wonderful man.

Entries.DialogueText: From the brightest winter star, to the fragrant fairy rose... nothing can compare with your captivating beauty. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: From the brightest winter star, to the fragrant fairy rose... nothing can compare with your captivating beauty.

Entries.DisplayPattern: A crackling fire adds wonderful ambience to the house... every piece of wood burns in a unique way.

Entries.DialogueText: I never had much success growing plants in my old beach house. Hopefully I can pick up a thing or two by watching you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I never had much success growing plants in my old beach house. Hopefully I can pick up a thing or two by watching you.

Entries.DialogueText: In this respect, you are the master and I only a humble apprentice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: In this respect, you are the master and I only a humble apprentice.

Entries.DialogueText: When I behold thy wondrous face, a precious jewel of form and grace, my heart... torn by the dread of night, is purified with golden light.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When I behold thy wondrous face, a precious jewel of form and grace, my heart... torn by the dread of night, is purified with golden light.

Entries.DialogueText: Poetry is the only way I can begin to describe my feelings for you. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Poetry is the only way I can begin to describe my feelings for you.

Entries.DialogueText: My love... I wouldn't trade you for 100 iridium bars.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My love... I wouldn't trade you for 100 iridium bars.

Entries.DialogueText: Not even 10,000 bars, no. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not even 10,000 bars, no.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Custom:7}
No, not even 100,000 bars! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: No, not even 100,000 bars!

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Sad}
Wa... one million bars of pure iridium...? Don't make me do this... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wa... one million bars of pure iridium...? Don't make me do this...

Entries.DisplayPattern: You always smell so good after a day of hard work. It's your natural musk!

Entries.DialogueText: You smell sweet, my dear. Like a honeycomb drifting on a pool of spice tea.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Taking a break? I guess being a er is easier than I thought...

Entries.DisplayPattern: This is perfect.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel inspired today... I think I'll do some writing.

Entries.DialogueText: That's why I live out here by myself. I figured a lonely life by the sea would help me focus on my literary aspirations... {Portrait:Sad}

Entries.DialogueText: Everyone back home said I was nuts... that I could never make it as a writer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Everyone back home said I was nuts... that I could never make it as a writer.

Entries.DialogueText: Can you believe it? They said 'For every successful author there's 1000 who fail miserably'. Such pessimism... it's sickening.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can you believe it? They said 'For every successful author there's 1000 who fail miserably'. Such pessimism... it's sickening.

Entries.DialogueText: I can see it in your eyes... you believe in me, {Farmer_Name}. You've got that spark.

Entries.DialogueText: Now that's inspiring! That's what I'm looking for...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now that's inspiring! That's what I'm looking for...

Entries.DisplayPattern: An occasional tune is the only recreation I allow myself.

Entries.DialogueText: There's just too much work to do! And my bank account's starting to run dry. {Portrait:Custom:7}

Entries.DisplayPattern: Come live on the , I could use the extra help.

Entries.DisplayPattern: You're right... that was an insensitive thing to say.

Entries.DisplayPattern: What I meant is that I'd like to get away from this dark, musty prison and experience a little bit of real life... that's all.

Entries.DialogueText: Ever since I was a young boy, I've dreamt of becoming a writer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ever since I was a young boy, I've dreamt of becoming a writer.

Entries.DialogueText: When the time came for me to leave home and start my own life, I moved here. I was drawn to the peaceful beauty of the valley, and hoped that days of quiet reflection in this idyllic atmosphere would fan the literary flames.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When the came for me to leave home and start my own life, I moved here. I was drawn to the peaceful beauty of the valley, and hoped that days of quiet reflection in this idyllic atmosphere would fan the literary flames.

Entries.DialogueText: After countless hours scribbling at my writing desk, I present to you my first novel: 'The Rise And Fall Of Planet Yazzo'... It's a sci-fi epic spanning thousands of years in an exotic planetary system.
Entries.DisplayPattern: After countless hours scribbling at my writing desk, I present to you my first novel: 'The Rise And Fall Of Planet Yazzo'... It's a sci-fi epic spanning thousands of years in an exotic planetary system.

Entries.DisplayPattern: May I have this dance?

Entries.DialogueText: I forgot that today was the Luau. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I forgot that today was the Luau.

Entries.DialogueText: What a shame... we have no respect for nature anymore.
Entries.DisplayPattern: What a shame... we have no respect for nature anymore.

Entries.DisplayPattern: The candle lights shimmering on the water are simply breathtaking. It looks like a painting coming to life.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's head to the docks soon, and welcome our aquatic guests!
